AbilityBonusOption.Description: None can defy you, and escape the long arm of your agents. Those suspected of wrongdoing are brought within, and their unruly wills bent to order. Even those who seek privacy are watched and followed by your vigilant inquisitors. Great minds and deeds may be muted by the ever-present eyes of your agents - but is that not the price of peace?

Your greatest warriors retire here to become masters. They drill lethal combat techniques and skills into your trained soldiers, that they might fight to the most skillful extent their mortal bodies allow.
This war academy teaches your warriors to survive battles against channelers.
This office uses emigration incentives to match the unemployed and crowded populations, with labor shortages and surplus food supplies across your lands.
A palace of games, where gambling and competitions of all sort are tastefully - and profitably - held all day and all night, in every season.
A cellar stocked with the finest vintages your land produces, aged in barrels of the finest wood. Your people will find it hard to disagree with your rule, when they have such quality wine to drink.
A crude mimicry of the Forge Of The Overlord. While it is utterly eclipsed by the miracle of the Forge proper, this enchanting focal point can still produce small wonders for your faction.
This crystalline aggregation is imbued with life energy, an attempt to re-create the treasure of the long-lost valley of Iru T'Alavar.
A flooded mass grave, a dare to the powers of death to come forth.
Your arcane society raises a structure that attracts mana itself. Like a lightning rod, it gathers magic from the ground, the air, and the sky, focusing untold energy to you.

Your arcane society is able to create a well that eternally pulls up enchanted water. Anyone who drinks of it is completely slaked of thirst, and cured of ailments. Any crops irrigated with the water flourish. Day and night, men pull up the buckets of literal 'eau de vie,' and fill barrels to ship across your lands. In the soil of your farms, this water could create a golden age for your nation.

The Grandmaster Weaponsmith has appeared, and offered his service to your civilization. Build him a Forge, and assign him your weapons and armor production - when they reach the hands of your soldiers, they shall fight as if Titans.
